00023 // %%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%% TestPrimes
00024 struct TestPrimes : CppUnit::TestFixture {
00025 
00026     // isprime() Tests
00027     void test_isprime_1 () {
00028         int number = 10;
00029         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(!isprime(number));
00030     }
00031 
00032     void test_isprime_2 () {
00033         int number = 2;
00034         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(isprime(number));
00035     }
00036     
00037     // read() Test
00038     void test_read () {
00039         std::istringstream i("0\n");
00040         const bool b = read(i);
00041         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(b  == true);
00042         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(in ==    0);
00043     }
00044     
00045     // eval() Tests
00046     void test_eval_1 () {
00047         in = 8;
00048         eval();
00049         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(isprime(sum[0]));
00050         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(isprime(sum[1]));
00051         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(isprime(sum[2]));
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(isprime(sum[3]));
00053         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(sum[0] + sum[1] + sum[2] + sum[3] == 8);
00054     }
00055 
00056     void test_eval_2 () {
00057         in = 0;
00058         eval();
00059         std::ostringstream out;
00060         print(out);
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(out.str() == "Impossible.\n");
00062     }
00063 
00064     // print() Test
00065     void test_print_1 () {
00066         in = 8; // Clears error code.
00067         sum[0] = sum[1] = sum[2] = sum[3] = 2;
00068         std::ostringstream out;
00069         print(out);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(out.str() == "2 2 2 2\n");
00071     }
00072 
00073     void test_print_2 () {
00074         in = -1; // Sets error code.
00075         std::ostringstream out;
00076         print(out);
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(out.str() == "Impossible.\n");
00078     }
00079     
00080     // Test Suite!
00081     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(TestPrimes);
00082     CPPUNIT_TEST(test_isprime_1);
00083     CPPUNIT_TEST(test_isprime_1);
00084     CPPUNIT_TEST(test_read);
00085     CPPUNIT_TEST(test_eval_1);
00086     CPPUNIT_TEST(test_eval_2);
00087     CPPUNIT_TEST(test_print_1);
00088     CPPUNIT_TEST(test_print_2);
00089     CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_END();
00090 };
